<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Metadata about the knowledge graph.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/textminingkp/metadata"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns JSON with metadata about the data sources in this knowledge graph.
